video.title: Friends with Benefits
video.synopsis: Best friends Ben and Sara each know what they want in the perfect mate. But in the meantime, they have each other to rely on -- in and out of bed.

episodes.synopsis: A group of twentysomething singles attempt to navigate the difficult, sometimes rewarding and often confusing world of dating.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Sara decide to take a break from the "benefits" part of their friendship while Aaron takes his relationship with Riley to another level.
episodes.title: The Benefit of the Mute Button

episodes.synopsis: Aaron, Ben and Fitz argue about the "pecking order" among the three of them, while Sara tries to prove that she can keep up with Riley's lifestyle.
episodes.title: The Benefit of the Unspoken Dynamic

episodes.synopsis: Ben begins dating an amnesiac, Fitz decides to find his mother a female companion, and Riley dates a man with an unusual obsession.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Forgetting

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Riley educate Sara about the "booty call track" while Fitz and Aaron celebrate their "roommate-aversary." Ryan McPartland guest stars.
episodes.title: The Benefit of the Right Track

episodes.synopsis: Sara and Ben get themselves in sticky situations with their co-workers. Elsewhere, Fitz gets antsy when he thinks he's in a monogamous relationship.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Keeping Your Ego in Check

episodes.synopsis: The Fab Five travel to Louisiana for Mardi Gras.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Mardi Gras

episodes.synopsis: Aaron learns that a girl from his past has become an adult film star, and Sara's hero from work becomes enamored with Riley.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Mentors

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Ben both end up dating people with unique characteristics that make them question how shallow they really are.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Being Shallow

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Ben lose focus when they are reunited with their "mindbangers." Elsewhere, Aaron acts like someone else in order to try to impress a woman.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Avoiding the Mindbanger

episodes.synopsis: An unemployed Ben tries a new business venture and asks Aaron to invest.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Putting in the Work

episodes.synopsis: Ben's feelings toward Sarah grow, and jealousy ensues. Meanwhile, Riley meets a man and soon finds that he doesn't have much time left.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Friends

episodes.synopsis: Sara and Ben agree to a double date with other people, while Fitz and Aaron formulate a plan to get rid of Riley's new boyfriend.
episodes.title: The Benefit of Full Disclosure
